content:
I join the MediaTek as Computer Vision and Deep Learning Research Engineer in winter, 2019. My research interests include deep learning and generative model.
During my colleage, I join the research team of Embedded System and Application Lab (ESA-Lab) which is host by Prof. Bor-Shing Lin. The research topic I consider is the deep learning object recognition system. During my graduate studeis, I work on image-to-image translation with Prof. Yu-Tai Ching.
In the meanwhile, I had the experience to do the research and cooperated with the Prof. Wei-Chen Chiu who is the leader of Enriched Vision Applications Lab (EVA-Lab). Finally, I also investigated some research topic on music with Dr. Li Su at National Tsing Hua University.
To fullfill my career goal, I am finding any AI research cooperation oppertunity within my research interests.
summary:
I join the MediaTek as Computer Vision and Deep Learning Research Engineer in winter, 2019. My research interests include deep learning and generative model.
During my colleage, I join the research team of Embedded System and Application Lab (ESA-Lab) which is host by Prof. Bor-Shing Lin. The research topic I consider is the deep learning object recognition system. During my graduate studeis, I work on image-to-image translation with Prof. Yu-Tai Ching.
title: Cheng-Che Lee (SunnerLi)

summary: This study proposes a simple smartphone-based guiding system for solving the navigation problems for visually impaired people and achieving obstacle avoidance to enable visually impaired people to travel smoothly from a beginning point to a destination with greater awareness of their surroundings.
title: Simple Smartphone-Based Guiding System for Visually Impaired People

summary: The re-implementation of ICCV 2017 DeepFuse paper idea
title: DeepFuse.pytorch

content: This is the graduate project of our college. This system can serve the people that tell them what it is in front of the road. The user can open the app and hold it toward the front. At the same time, the phone would try to connect to the server. The phone would keep catching the image of the front, and send to the server. Next, the server would use image processing algorithm to recognize the distance, direction and type of the obstacle. At last, the result would be sent back and tell the user.
summary: This is the graduate project of our college.
title: Easy-Guide
